Right after WE get done making this nation great again, I know YOUR generation will make America greater than ever before.

Your education in the liberal arts has empowered you to conserve the foundations of our freedom‚Ä¶ and you are now uniquely suited ‚Äì and I believe you are uniquely called ‚Äì to renew the fabric of our national life.

The percentage of Americans who live out their religion on a weekly basis ‚Äì by praying, going to church, and reading and believing in the Bible ‚Äì has remained remarkably consistent over the decades, even as the population of the United States has grown by leaps and bounds.
